esther module

task(graftask)[source]

Collect frequency data of common nouns in Esther per bible book.

This is part of reproducing results in Martijn Naaijer’s thesis.

We count lexemes of common nouns throughout the bible and we deliver a table of counts of all lexemes and a table of frequencies of lexemes restricted to the common nouns of Esther.

When counting lexemes, we count the occurrences of words. If word1 and word2 have n1 and n2 occurrences, and both have the same lexeme, then lexeme has n1 plus n2 occurrences.

When we compute frequencies, we divide lexeme occurrences as defined above by the total number of word occurrences.

Returns:lexemes_all.txt (file) – a table of all lexemes, ordered by bible book, with the number of occurrences in that bible book.
Returns:lexemes_esther.txt (file) – a matrix with as rows the lexemes of common nouns in Esther and as columns the books of the bible. A cell contain the frequency of that lexeme in that book multiplied by 1000
